title: #KindaFunnyE3 - How to Watch Kinda Funny at E3
description:
LIVE! Sunday - Monday
www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames

LIVE! Tuesday - Thursday
www.gamespot.com/E3

LIVE! Friday at The Attack
www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames

Kinda Funny Gamescast
www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames


#KindaFunnyE3



Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino



Music by Tonedeff!: http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody I'm Greg Miller and this is the P one Tim Gettys Tim host Tim we're here at E3 oh yes it's very exciting Kinda Funny as first E3 and we decided we wouldn't go quietly into the night our first E3 we'd go pretty big so there's a whole bunch of stuff to tell you about it as Colin already put it it comes in acts so act one is what to act one is the Kinda Funny Twitch Extravaganza so on twitch.tv/ Kinda Funny games on Sunday and Monday we're covering all of the press conferences you get a pre-show you get a post show you get all that goodness you want to watch the conferences we're going to have it right there get the conference that's the big thing everybody's asking us like do I have to click off on the no you can just put on twitch.tv/ Kinda Funny games and sit there the entire day Sunday leave it on through Monday doing your whole thing you talk to all your friends you say hey Devon CM what's up am gills what's happening in Ireland nobody cares yeah it's going

the entire day Sunday leave it on through Monday doing your whole thing you talk to all your friends you say hey Devon CM what's up am gills what's happening in Ireland nobody cares yeah it's going to be good it's going to be really really good and then for all of you at home that aren't watching live you can watch it on VOD on YouTube and SoundCloud all the podcast stuff cuz what we're doing is we're doing a special Gamescast post show for every single conference every conference you're getting a new Gamescast pumped out to you via video and MP3 players are around the world yeah so that's going to be a lot of fun that leads to act two now act two is probably the craziest thing we've ever done it's Gamespot cross find cross Kinda Funny Gamespot cross Kinda Funny not NX this is NX this is Gamespot cross Kinda Funny uh basically what's happening Tim is that Gamespot was like hey we have a second stage do you guys want it and so we took it and we booked it with all our crazy LA

is Gamespot cross Kinda Funny uh basically what's happening Tim is that Gamespot was like hey we have a second stage do you guys want it and so we took it and we booked it with all our crazy LA friends and devs we got Cisco we got Brandon Routh we got Deon S we got Tony Hawk I get to interview Tony Hawk we have Neil Druckmann we have Bruce Try we have Troy Baker all these people who are making Uncharted 4 we have Shuhei Yoshida we have Halo guys we got Aaron Greenberg from Xbox there's a million people coming over to hang out with us all that is at gamespot.com/e3 and that's Tuesday through Thursday live we're there talking to you crazy things happening I'm making people eat hot peppers oh great yeah we love that we love that a lot sorry Jeff Gerstmann and then act three Tim what's act three

act three is we're going to the attack Kevin Pereira's thing on Friday it's going to be cool we're going to do a special Colin and Greg live where it's Colin Greg and Kevin and then we're going to do some some stuff for them it's going to be really fun so this week's crazy for us yeah you get that at twitch.tv/ Kinda Funny games no funny business there it'll be there hanging out doing that stream attacking yeah attacking we'll be attacking everybody yeah but the biggest thing is going to be this week of E3 follow us on Twitter follow us in wherever you're watching this video there's going to be a lot more content coming get excited talk to us in the chat and most importantly use # Kinda Funny E3 nail it I got that was perfect I got nothing to say there you go you want to try it one more time or we good I think that was great
